hero_title: Fast, reliable transport solutions tailored to your business.
hero_subtitle: National and international service with immediate response and direct communication.
hero_nat_text: Full coverage across Spain with flexible collections and on-time deliveries.
hero_int_text: Road transport operations across Europe with continuous tracking and transparent communication.
hero_urg_text: When every minute counts, we provide immediate and tailored solutions.
services_nat_text: We manage shipments throughout Spain with speed, punctuality and close communication.
services_int_text: Road transport solutions across Europe for full and partial loads.
services_urg_text: Immediate availability for critical shipments with delivery in the shortest possible time.
services_group_text: Efficient options for recurring shipments or shared loads.
services_custom_text: We design tailored solutions according to the type of goods, destination and urgency.
areas_cat_text: Daily collections and flexible service throughout the region.
areas_iberia_text: Full coverage in Spain and Portugal with trusted partners.
areas_eu_text: International transport with optimised transit times and maximum reliability.
solutions_industry_text: Safe and punctual transport for sensitive or urgent goods.
solutions_ecom_text: Fast solutions adapted to demand peaks.
solutions_distributors_text: Regular routes, scheduled deliveries and optimised load management.
solutions_smb_text: Flexible service, no minimums and personalised attention.
providers_text: We are looking for committed professionals to expand our network of partners. We offer clear communication, on-time payments and steady routes.
about_text: TOR EXPRESS is a company focused on providing fast, efficient and tailored transport solutions for every client. We believe in direct communication, punctuality and trust as the basis of every shipment. Our goal is to become your logistics partner of reference.
contact_text: Tell us what you need and we will offer you the most suitable solution.
